title: [Plains of Bone, Boneyard]
description: A small trench cuts through the grass and bones.  Muddy water, black in the night darkness, flows through the small stream, occasionally dislodging a small bone to send it downstream.  An enormous leg bone from an unknown creature rests in the stream, diverting it into two small channels.
